job.title: Software Engineer (BackEnd)
job.description: pstrongTelepathy LabsstrongppWe believe it is passion which drives us Our technology revolves around this core philosophy Innovation creativity and a passion for everimproving performance drive our company and our people forward With the ambition to disrupt the current enterprise landscape with integrating AI into legacy businesses we started with an incredible team with global talents in the US Europe and Asia We are moving extremely fast and are looking for talents like you to join usppbrppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppTL is looking for exceptional Software Engineer to join us in building stateoftheart voice based conversational AI for enterprise You will be involved in the evolution of the companys Innovation Centres process based on industry best practices providing bestinclass software architecture and following coding best practices methodologies processes and concepts You should be proficient in writing elegant readable and welldocumented codeppbrppstrongJob RequirementsstrongpulliBachelors degree in Computer Science or related field or extensive experience and aptitude in software engineeringlili3 or more years application development and delivery experienceliliExperience with cloud based development andor UNIXLINUX environmentliliKnowledge of relational databases and SQLliliUnderstanding of the software development cycle and agile development practiceliliSolid understanding of OOPliliUnderstanding of web technology stackliliStrong analytical skills and wellversed in problem solving skillsliliGood communication skillsliulpbrppstrongDesirablestrongpullistrongExperience with strongBackend technologies using C ASPNET Web APIliliExperience with containerized environments in a production setting Docker Swarm KubernetesliliExperience with realtime messaging AMQP TibRV Solace andor stream processing platforms Kafka and REST APIgRPCliul
